attributes.action: provide fair treatment for couples on Working Family's Tax Credit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
currently ( as reported by several non tabloid newspapers ) if a couple earn and extra £1000 they only get to keep £300 of it after tax and the lowering of their working family's tax credits.

This is a massive disincentive for people trying to get a better job and hits couples who try to do some overtime in order to pay for Christmas etc especially hard
